name: Dicey Duel
description:
This was the first game I've ever made and I decided to make it in 48 hours... for some reason. I think it kinda sucks to be honest but I didn't expect to make a AAA success on my first try. This was just for practice really and I don't expect anyone to ever play it.

It is a short 2d turn-based boss battle with a stamina meter that determines the chance you land a hit.

Music: https://opengameart.org/content/boss-battle-2-8-bit

Instructions:

Use arrow keys to dodge left and right.

Your stamina determines you chance to land a hit so try to keep it high or risk wasting a turn.

Hit - Deals damage but may miss depending on the amount of stamina you have

Double down - Regains 4 stamina but you take double damage next turn

Fold - Regains 2 stamina and you take less damage next turn
